question: The overall efficiency of a reaction turbine is the ratio of

answers.a: Power produced by the turbine to the energy actually supplied by the turbine
answers.b: Actual work available at the turbine to the energy imparted to the wheel
answers.c: Work done on the wheel to the energy (or head of water) actually supplied to the turbine

question: As water flows through the runner of a reaction turbine, pressure acting on it would vary from

answers.a: More than atmospheric pressure to vacuum
answers.b: Less than atmospheric pressure to zero gauge pressure
answers.c: Atmospheric pressure to more than atmospheric pressure

Which of the serious problem arise from cavitation
In a Francis turbine, the pressure at inlet is ___ that at outlet.
